skills.skill: Clinical Care or Managed Care experience

duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform coding services in a production driven environment, ensuring accuracy and efficiency.
Maintain ICD-10 proficiency and stay up to date with coding regulations and standards.
Utilize CPT coding experience to accurately assign codes for medical procedures and services.
Nationally RAD-V/HEDIS abstraction experience to abstract information from medical records and assign corresponding codes.
Apply clinical care or managed care experience to understand and code complex healthcare services and diagnoses.

education_certification.credential: Active coding certification (AHIMA, CCS-P, CCS, OR AAPC)
